website_summaries.verdict: A powerful choline supplement from a trustworthy brand. If you're looking for an easily absorbed, high potency option, this one is hard to beat.
pros: Delivers high concentrations of Alpha GPC – the most bioavailable source of choline
Garners praise for its ability to quickly improve memory and enhance focus
Reliable quality from a health supplement industry leader
cons: High potency form can cause headaches and an upset stomach in some users

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product; however, the recommended amount is way too high (at least for me). Beginners should start out with only 75mg (1/3 powder in the pill) ... Not 600mg. Taking 600 gave me heart palps and extreme anxiety. I was able to focus alright ... On extreme anxiety lol. Advice is to start with small amount as your brain may not need much choline.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Hoollyy craap!
customer_reviews.text: I took 2 because i ran outta adderal. I am addicted to adderal and cant funtion without it. I tried 8 nootropics to try and replace it. I tried this and at first i was dissapointed because i just felt tired after an hour of taking it. So then i took 2 more in desperation. Went right to sleep. I woke up later and was going to try and return it to money back. But then a few hours later i started to feel amaaazing! Not even kidding. Like when i first started adderal. Its crazy is this stuff legal lol. I dont care i love it. The first thing to ever come close to adderal for me. Wooopyyyyy
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: I'm 80, so I need all the help I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 80, so I need all the help I can find to keep my brain working - I'm taking this for 2 years now and I swear it makes a big difference in my short term memory. I take it together with Huperzine. I no longer wake up, look at my wife and ask: "who are you?"
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Results can be different for each person
customer_reviews.text: I used this product with some other supplements and got results, these products are hard to review, because they will work differently with each person and sometimes they won't work, I can not take these for long periods of time, I build a resistance to them fast and so I stop using them, then come back with a change up. That is just me I can't say it will work for anyone else and not trying to. Hope this is of help.
customer_reviews.author: TONY DERR

customer_reviews.title: No changes seen yet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is having short-term memory issues due to a stroke and this was recommended to us by another patient. We have not yet seen any improvement and he has been taking 1200 mg per day for 3 months. Clinical trials state they did 5 months at that dosage...but it is not clear as to when changes occurred. He will continue to take this but I am not as hopeful as I was for seeing any improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Llama Kisses

customer_reviews.title: The Best Effects
customer_reviews.text: This supplement does not create strange or unusual effects. It provides efficient brain activity and makes me feel normal.
customer_reviews.author: William Vietinghoff

customer_reviews.title: If Alpha GCP was of any benefit to my health
customer_reviews.text: It was undetectable. This is the first time I consumed this product. I tried to follow the suggested usage on the label most days but I did not take both capsules at once as is suggested. So I'm giving it 3 stars instead of 1 in case my dosing affected the lack of results. I don't absorb capsules so I poured the contents into a spoon and consumed it as a powder. I noticed if I put it in my vitamin cup the night before it was damp and difficult to remove the next morning. The term is hydroscopic. I don't know if that affected its effectiveness but all in all I won't likely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Sky

customer_reviews.title: Daily regimen
customer_reviews.text: Been part of my daily regime for years. Keeps me focused a great extra boost to start my day.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm42

customer_reviews.title: This is the only thing missing in B-Stress vitamins OTC ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing missing in B-Stress vitamins OTC. Who knew OTC Vitamin B supplements didn't include Choline? I feel a ton more balanced and less reactive to high stress situations.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as Citicoline
customer_reviews.text: This does not work like Citicoline to potentate my Rx for modafinil.

customer_reviews.title: Made me tired
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to improve focus and concentration for studying but it ended up making me really tired and depressed LOL. I guess I'll stick to eggs as a Choline source.

customer_reviews.title: i have noticed i have more patience to focus on tasks at hand and have been able to retain information i have read in books a lo

customer_reviews.author: lyn v.

customer_reviews.title: Helps alleviate nootropic headaches
customer_reviews.text: I got this primarily to help alleviate headaches that are caused by some nootropic supplements and it seems to be working in that regard. I have not experienced any of the other benefits that some reviewers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Perryman

customer_reviews.title: my go-to Alpha GPC
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to Alpha GPC for awhile now. I find it very effective and notice if I don't take it for a week or two, when I run out. This gets my brain and mouth running at the same speeds. I teach and I find myself reaching that "flow state" while teaching, more and more, when I'm supplementing with Alpha GPC.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: I developed bad cramps on my feet and pain in my neck ...
customer_reviews.text: I developed bad cramps on my feet and pain in my neck and right side of my head after just one day of consumption. I never had these symptoms before! Stopped taking it, pain and cramps went away.
customer_reviews.author: Datura

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Mental clarity improves significantly when i take this. My physical ability is also enhanced.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kakareko

customer_reviews.title: Personally not effective
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to rate this product. I've been taking it as prescribed for 3 weeks now without any discernable effects, regardless of the time of day in which I took it. I don't want to give it 1-star because I've heard good things, and there seem to be plenty of people who are benefiting from it. Maybe I'll notice a difference after it runs out at the end of this week??
customer_reviews.author: jdgreene777

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it did anything
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if there was any noticeable benefit or improvement from this. I’ve tried another brand on and off for over a year and noticed slight improvement and mental clarity but not much from this.
customer_reviews.author: WDW

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not work even on higher doses. I think there is a money back guarantee that I will request for.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wachira

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable effect
customer_reviews.text: I tried this at the recommendation of other Amazon users. I've come to an understanding that everything I feel and experience has a lot to do with my body chemistry -- so I'm happy to try something that may have a benefit. For this product I didnt have any noticeable effect so I can't tell if it's doing what it's supposed to do. In terms of choline I have a much better response to pure powder, but again, people respond differently to chemicals so worth a try at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good dosage for a solid price. I love now products and this is no exception
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I did feel this working however it was at very different than expected. Some days I’d feel it after I had it with breakfast and some days I didn’t feel it until mid day. Just feels like a little caffeine high of sorts to compare.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for removing bupropion induced headaches.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. If you are taking an anti-chlorogenic medicine like bupropion, you will need Alpha GPC to avoid headaches. Just be mindful of your intake and bodies requirements. To much choline can be dangerous and the threshold is highly dependent on genetics. Know your body.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Helped a great deal with mental clarity/state
customer_reviews.text: I took this as part of a mold (Chronic Inflammatory Response Syndrome - CIRS) protocol I found on self-hacked.com where it said inflammatory cascades reduce the body's production of the neurotransmitter, Acetyl Choline. Helped a great deal with mental clarity/state, and reduced the bizarre neurological symptoms that come with these chronic fatigue diseases - neuralgia, muscle twitches, GI stuff, etc.
customer_reviews.author: RAPKGP

customer_reviews.title: Focus and Clarity
customer_reviews.text: This is very good choline.. There is a big difference in my focus and clarity

customer_reviews.title: Great HGH boost and Anti-aging Brain compound
customer_reviews.text: I take alpha GPC before I work out because in studies 600mg boosted human growth hormone levels by about 200 percent whether subjects were at rest or active. The HGH boost only lasts for about 90 minutes so its good to take this product an hour before working out to get the HGH boost.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: the best supplement I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I tried many different supplements to help increase my mental performance and this one works really well. I would recommend this to friends.

customer_reviews.title: Who knows
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this did anything for me. I couldn't tell at all if there were any benefits to taking it. I'll probably finish off the bottle but not sure I'll order it again. Don't take this as a positive or negative review because I just couldn't tell if it did anything for me.

I generally like to take these in the morning and feel sharper as I go about my day.

customer_reviews.title: Alpha GPC
customer_reviews.text: Haven't noticed anything substantial from taking this product, but I suppose its effects are gradual enough that they probably won't be for anyone. Alpha GPC did help with certain side effects (e.g. headaches) from other nootropics, so it's worth the money if your headed down that route.
customer_reviews.author: Bach12

customer_reviews.title: I take it with some other stuff
customer_reviews.text: I take this stuff as part of a regimen of other stuff. I take it with "now" True Focus and 3g of Piracetam. I notice that when I don't use Alpha GPC the effects of the Piracetam aren't as strong. As with all these nootropic supplements, the effects are subtle but I can definitely tell a difference when I'm not taking the Alpha GPC.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas K Prater

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: In my quest for the perfect nootropic, I decided to buy Alpha GPC. Unfortunately, it did nothing for me. I felt no noticeable change in my concentration, memory retention or in recalling facts and figures. So far, good old caffeine pills are the way to go for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works well as Nootropic stack
customer_reviews.text: I have take 2 in the morning along with L-Tyrosine and caffeine to get my brain in gear for the day. Sometimes I'll take an additional 3rd pill before 130P. Do not advise taking later in the afternoon for it might interfere with sleep.
customer_reviews.author: cg, california

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to wait to write a review, because ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to write a review, because usually it takes a while to actually notice the effects. I take this with piracetam. I definitely notice a difference and how synergistic it is with it. The effect is more pronounced. I can think more clearly and I don't get a headache AT ALL when I take piracetam with this. Overall I feel energetic, awake, uplifted and just ready for the day !
customer_reviews.author: Derek Dong

customer_reviews.title: A More Stimulating Form of Choline.
customer_reviews.text: I take this primarily to prevent headaches when taking Racetams. After some experimenting, I realized that this stuff seems to work better in combination with Choline Biterate. Compared to CDP-Choline, this seems more stimulating, while CDP makes me slightly sleepy. An unexpected side effect is it increased my body temperature noticeably. But since it is winter still, that doesn't bother me, for now. I have not tried any other brand of Alpha-GPC though, so I have no way of comparing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daly

customer_reviews.title: I use a reduced dose (1 tablet per day) on ...
customer_reviews.text: I use a reduced dose (1 tablet per day) on those days when I just can't seem to get moving. Within 30 minutes I find that I have lots of energy.

Everyone is different and different forms might affect people differently but this has been the best form for me.

I have stopped taking and will return what I have not opened of my order. This supplement was not for me.

customer_reviews.author: NGODSKR

customer_reviews.title: Limited, if any, efficacy in increasing cognition
customer_reviews.text: After taking two capsules a day for a month, this brand of alpha-GPC hasn't had any noticeable effect on me. Throughout the duration of my use, I've composed songs, studied, taken tests, wrote down thoughts and observations, and made the deliberate effort to try to recall words after looking them up, all to no (different) avail. I usually like Now Foods, and they make good stuff, so I believe the problem lurks somewhere in my unpolished brain. Still, if you're already fresh in mind and mentation, this product may be altogether a waste of money. (It's worth mentioning, too, that brains functioned very well before these products were even around!)
customer_reviews.author: Asim Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Im not particuarly impressed. The capsules advertise 300 mg's of Alpha GPC per capsule, however the capsules weigh somewhere around 750 mg's which means most of the actual capsule is just a filler. Which lends to my assumptions that this company does not produce a very good quality product and am skeptical as to the actual content of alpha GPC in the supplement. However I have been taking these with my own handmade capsules of 850 mg Oxiracetam and have noticed a slight increase in brain function such as alertness, critical thinking, focus and memory.
customer_reviews.author: Dsull

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my brain fog.
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been plagued with mental fuzziness for an hour or three in the morning. Coffee, sessions at the gym, and deep breathing didn't do a thing -- my brain/mind stayed fuzzy. then a friend recommended Alpha GPC. In two days the fog lifted and has stayed lifted for the several months I've been taking it. If your mental airport is fogged in, try Alpha GPC.
customer_reviews.author: Summa Nulla

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it..very sexy and nice...no clue...im very confused ...i'm high on life...how many words more?!...wow 5 words 3 2 1...im done...!!!
customer_reviews.author: CALIMERO

customer_reviews.title: Best supplement I’ve ever taken!
customer_reviews.text: My health was restored in 3 weeks taking 600 mg Alpha GPC! It helps me focus as well as improving my memory. I have less joint and nerve pain. I’m able to handle stressful situation without falling apart. I have more energy and I feel great! I feel like myself again. Alpha GPC has been nothing short of a miracle in my life!
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: I love how I feel when I take them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 28, and I always have very bad memory, so I thought maybe some supplements might help. Well, they do! I'm not sure about the memory part, but two days in, I feel great when I get up, my mood is better, and it almost felt as if everything is more crisp and clear. I'm going to try a few other ones before I re-purchase due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: ClariFairy

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for their effects on sleep
customer_reviews.text: Almost too subjective to even both writing a review about this stuff, so the 2 stars doesn't really matter. For me, at least, I couldn't sleep when taking this stuff. I don't know why but it caused insomnia, even when I took it in the morning. A friend of mine says it really enhances dreams, and he dreams almost all night every night - and that it was an amazing product. I personally, totally hate the stuff, but other people swear by it. Might be better to go ahead and borrow some before you waste much money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Torrance

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: When I take this after not taking it for a while I feel a lot better and have way more mental clarity. After taking it for a couple days it starts to lose its effects and I fee agitated. I have always loved NOW products and this is just another one added to the list. I have also taken this with piracetam and they team up nicely. It's unfortunate but my body only seems to be able to take any sort of supplement for a couple days with positive results before it starts losing effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great REM sleep with this combined with Choline
customer_reviews.text: I recently tried this productto help me dream at night. It works great! I had some crazy good dreams and no nightmares. But the problem is that this was $30 for a 45 day supply. I decided to try to buy the ingredients listed in it and see if the result would be the same. Well i am here to report that it is then same. I take it every other night and have the most awesome dreams that I can remember. I got this choline. I tried the Huperzine A but it gave me a headache. So i am just taking this with the choline and getting great REM sleep. You should try it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Helps memory
customer_reviews.text: I have found this supplement helps with my memory. I was skeptical at first, but I seem to be able to find words I am looking for more easily.
customer_reviews.author: followson

product_meta.title: NOW Supplements, Alpha GPC 300 mg with Bioavailable Source of Choline, 60 Veg Capsules
product_meta.description: Alpha GPC is a natural physiological precursor to acetyl-choline, a neurotransmitter that is involved in memory and other cognitive functions.* Alpha GPC is more bioavailable than other forms of choline and is known to cross the blood brain barrier. In the brain and other neural tissues, Alpha GPC becomes a constituent of cell membranes.* Clinical studies have demonstrated that supplementation with Alpha GPC can support the brain's synthesis of acetyl-choline.* In this way, it helps to promote normal cognitive function and mental acuity.* Natural color variation may occur in this product.
feature_bullets: BIOAVAILABLE SOURCE OF CHOLINE: 600 mg of Alpha GPC per serving
SUPPORTS MENTAL ACUITY*: Promotes normal cognitive function*
CERTIFICATIONS/CLASSIFICATIONS: Dairy Free, Egg Free, Made without Gluten, Nut Free, Vegan

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation)
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
